page.title: 05LIFE STYLES
page.content: I am 11 years old and I live in a four hundred year old cottage in Porthoustock. I was one when I moved here from Redruth. My family chose Porthoustock because it was peaceful, quiet countryside by the sea. I love walking in the valley and along the cliffs. I make dens all over the place. I go swimming from the beach in the Summer. The east wind is a disadvantage and the visitors who leave litter which I don't like. Being away from the village means I have to have a bike or walk. My parents don't like the isolation. Dad leaves early to go to work as a carpenter. Mummy works for the 'nurse bank'. I go fishing with my friend who has a holiday cottage. I like living here because there is always something to do.
